column5: We want to out to the trent for the weekend for some waleye and pike. We need some bait and light gear. I kinda want to get minnows there. Does anyone have her phone#. Id like to call first to be sure she is open. Thanks for any help!
Tackle/Bait Marion's Live Bait Princess Street Havelock, ON K0L 1Z0 Phone: 705-778-2860    Pat's Live Bait RR #4 Havelock, ON K0L 1Z0 Phone: 705-778-3064

Awesome and Thanks GBW! Can i ask where you found this info? I looked in yellow pages with no luck.. I'd rather marions cause she has an awesome deal on worms. 100 for 10 bucks! Kids can pan fish all day at that price!
No prob, I found it here. http://www.havelockbelmontmethuen.on.ca/businessdir.php#Tackle%2FBait
I also found it quickly with Canada411.ca  http://canada411.yellowpages.ca/search/?stype=si&bn=false&what=Marions+bait+and+tackle&where=Havelock%2C+Ontario&x=28&y=8
It was also in the status bar.
thanks guys. I called and they indeed are open this sat and will have lots of minnows!!
